thread.title: Top 10 Airbnb listings in Atlanta
thread.title_full: Top 10 Airbnb listings in Atlanta | www.ajc.com

author: Lauren Colley
title: Top 10 Airbnb listings in Atlanta
text:
Since its inception in 2008, Airbnb, the popular online home rental company, has changed the hospitality industry . And with more than 3,000 listings, Atlanta has been an active part of this home-sharing economy.
From quaint bungalows in Grant Park, to a treehouse in Buckhead, there are options to meet many lodging needs.
These are the 10 most popular listings in Atlanta, according to data from AirDnA, a site that helps Airbnb renters create more competitive listings:
1.) 1BD Intown Apt. Great Location
Reviews: 4.9 stars from 229 reviews
Neighborhood: Grant Park
Bedrooms: 1
Nightly rate: $95
2.) 1 BR home - ATL's Hippest Enclave!
Reviews: 4.4 stars from 196 Reviews
Neighborhood: Reynoldstown
Bedrooms: 1
Nightly rate: $65
3.) Downtown/Midtown Skyline View Condo
Reviews: 5.0 stars from 185 reviews
Neighborhood: Downtown
Bedrooms: 1
Nightly rate: $115
4.) Amazing 4 Star Loft Condo
Reviews: 4.9 stars from 168 reviews
Neighborhood: Poncey-Highland/Inman Park
Bedrooms: 1
Nightly rate: $120
5.) Mid-century by the Metro Station
Reviews: 4.8 of 163 reviews
Neighborhood: East Point
Bedrooms: 1
Nightly rate: $45
6.) Historic Intown 1BD Apt Sleeps 4
Reviews: 4.7 stars from 156 reviews
Neighborhood: Cabbagetown
Bedrooms: 1
Nightly rate: $89
7.) Downtown Mid-Century Modern Condo
Reviews: 4.9 stars from 153 reviews
Neighborhood: Downtown
Bedrooms: 1
Nightly rate: $120
8.) Urban oasis in Candler Park
Reviews: 4.8 stars from 52 reviews
Neighborhood: Candler Park
Bedrooms: 1
Nightly rate: $78
9.) Secluded Intown Treehouse
Reviews: 4.9 stars from 152 reviews
Neighborhood: Memorial Park/Wildwood/Springlake
Bedrooms: 1
Nightly rate: $350
10.) Modern Luxury High Rise, Buckhead
Reviews: 4.9 stars from 136 reviews
Neighborhood: Garden Hills/Buckhead Village/Peachtree Park
Bedrooms: 1
Nightly rate: $149
